mapper.select: SELECT nbno, subject, content, nickname, type, target, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, hit, isNotice, num FROM (SELECT nbno, subject, content, nickname, type, target, regdate, hit, isNotice, rownum as num FROM (SELECT nbno, subject, content, nickname, type, target, regdate, hit, isNotice FROM noticeboard WHERE userid=#{id} ORDER BY nbno DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
